sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ProductItemContainer, ProductItemImageContainer, ProductItemImage, ProductItemText, ProductName, ProductPrice, ProductNewPrice, ProductOldPrice} from "./product-item.styles";
const ProductItem = ({product}) => {
  console.log(product)
  return (
    <ProductItemContainer>
      <ProductItemImageContainer>
        <ProductItemImage src={product.imageUrl}/>        
      </ProductItemImageContainer>
      <ProductItemText>        
        <ProductName>{product.name}</ProductName>
        <ProductPrice>
          <ProductNewPrice>{product.price * product.discount}</ProductNewPrice>
          <ProductOldPrice>{product.price}</ProductOldPrice>
        </ProductPrice>
      </ProductItemText>
    </ProductItemContainer>
  )
}

export default ProductItem
